card.name: Sigarda's Splendor
card.text: As Sigarda's Splendor enters the battlefield, note your life total.At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card if your life total is greater than or equal to the last noted life total for Sigarda's Splendor. Then note your life total.Whenever you cast a white spell, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sigarda, Champion of Light
card.text: Flying, trampleHumans you control get +1/+1.Coven — Whenever Sigarda attacks, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Human creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Siphon Insight
card.text: Look at the top two cards of target opponent's library. Exile one of them face down and put the other on the bottom of that library. card.name: Smoldering Egg
card.text: DefenderWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a number of ember counters on Smoldering Egg equal to the amount of mana spent to cast that spell. Then if Smoldering Egg has seven or more ember counters on it, remove them and transform Smoldering Egg.

card.name: Tainted Adversary
card.text: DeathtouchWhen Tainted Adversary enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{B} any number of times. When you pay this cost one or more times, put that many +1/+1 counters on Tainted Adversary, then create twice that many black 2/2 Zombie creature tokens with decayed. (A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Teferi, Who Slows the Sunset
card.text: +1: Choose up to one target artifact, up to one target creature, and up to one target land. Untap the chosen permanents you control. Tap the chosen permanents you don't control. You gain 2 life.−2: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.−7: You get an emblem with "Untap all permanents you control during each opponent's untap step" and "You draw a card during each opponent's draw step."
